=Main Screen=
*Visible:*
 * Model name
 * Battery voltage
 * Timer
 * Timer actuation (Time, Throttle, Throttle%)
 * Trim increments (Exponential, Extra fine, Fine, Medium, Coarse)
 * Throttle trim (on/off)
 * Value bars that show the output of the first 8 channels.
 * Trim bars that show the position of the trims.


===Down/Up===
Change between value bars and numerical representation.

===Long Down/Up===
Statistics screens

Model Select/Setup
